div.ab:
لحمد والحمد قد سقي من هـذا
النّيل العام كأحسن
ما سقي منه قط فـأرجو أن
يكون هذا العام إن شــا
اللّه عاما مباركا فمر أهل
أرضك بالزّراع وحثّهم حثّا
عليه وتعهّد ذلك منهم وابعث
عليه من يتبع فيه أمرك ولا تكلن
ذلك إلى من يعرك منه فإن
رص إذا زرعت عمرت
وأخرج اللّه الّذي عليها من
الحق فاكفنى ذلك ولا
ألومنّك فيه فإن زراع
أهل الأرض رأس أمرهم
بعد أمر اللّه وعمرانهم
صلاحهم
والسّلم على من اتّبع الهدى
وكتب بسيل فى المحرّم
من سنة إحدى وتسعين

***
ø wa ăl ḥamdu qad suqiya min hāḏā
ăn nīlu ăl ʿāma ka ʾaḥsani
mā suqiya min hu qaṭṭu fa ʾarǧū ʾan
yakūna hāḏā ăl ʿāmu ʾin šāʾa
ăl lāhu ʿām:an mubārak:an fa mur ʾahla
ʾarḍi ka bi ăz zirāʿi wa ḥuṯṯi him ḥaṯṯ:an
ʿalay hi wa taʿahhad ḏālika min hum wa ĭbʿaṯ
ʿalay hi man yatbaʿu fī hi ʾamra ka wa lā takilanna
ḏālika ʾilà man yaʿruku min hu fa ʾinna
ăl ʾarḍa ʾiḏā zuriʿat ʿamurat
wa ʾaḫraǧa ăl lāhu ăllaḏī ʿalay hā mina
ăl ḥaqqi fa ĭkfi nī ḏālika wa lā
ʾalūmanna ka fī hi fa ʾinna zirāʿa
ʾahli ăl ʾarḍi raʾsu ʾamri him
baʿda ʾamri ăl lāhi wa ʿumrānu hum
wa ṣalāḥu hum
wa ăs salāmu ʿalà mani ĭttabaʿa ăl hudà
wa kataba basīlu fī ăl muḥarrami
min sanaẗi ʾiḥdà wa tisʿīna

Praise (be): The irrigation by the
Nile this year has been even with the best
irrigation ever. Therefore I hope that
this year will be, God
willing, a blessed year. Hence order the people of
your land to undertake cultivation and urge them zealously
and secure a contract from them to that effect. Then send out ... und gib Dir Mühe, dies bei ihnen zu erreichen. Dann ernenne (bestimme)
for this purpose one who will carry out your order concerning it, and do not entrust hierfür jemanden, der ...
this to such as will hinder you from (carrying) it (out). For
when the land is cultivated, it prospers,
God causing it to bring forth its due
yield. Satify me in this, and I will not
blame you in the matter. For cultivation
by the people of the land is their chief duty,
after their duty to God, and (constitutes) their prosperity and
their welfare.
Peace be with those who follow the guidance.
Written by Basil in Muḥarram
of the year one and ninety.
